featured.text: My father started to suffer from memory loss right after his marriage.
She wanted to get away from her unhappy marriage.
Several years later, her marriage began to fail.
It is said that in ancient times a man would place a drop of blood between his wife’s eyes to seal their marriage.
For example, they have quite different _____ about what marriage means in their life.

definition.zh_def: 婚姻：兩個人之間的法律或社會結合，通常基於愛情、承諾或家庭關係。
definition.en_def: Marriage: A legal or social union between two individuals, typically based on love, commitment, or familial ties.
definition.example: They celebrated their marriage with a beautiful ceremony.
